name: sparse-bit-string
description: A utility for packing large integer sets in to URL-encodable strings.

scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run build && npm test
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rimraf package-lock.json node_modules
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test

author: Tim Rowe <tim@tjsr.id.au>
